Text:
Arg, can't edit atm... Correction, Bitrate is 2103kbps 

....might as well leave the active link while I'm at it: http://bayimg.com/BaPcdaACl
i cannot hear? Where do i Get AC3 i have divx   help

Ah, dunno if you found it already, but there are a couple of options for the AC3 decoder. You can get ffdshow-tryouts, or CCCP (Combined Community Codec Pack), or my personal preference, AC3Filter.

AC3Filter is probably your best option if the AC3 decoder is the only codec you don't have. The reason I like it is because it tends to play all AC3 files well, whereas I sometimes get bad playback with ffdshow.

Hope this helps and Thanks. :)
